reviews.reviewTitle: Huge space, 2 layers, easy to clean
reviews.reviewText:
This is an awesome airfryer. This has two layers so it is perfect for family gatherings. The digital touch buttons are a plus. I fried chicken wings in this airfryer and they turned out to be great!
I bought this after my previous airfryer broke down which was much smaller and accommodated only one layer of food to cook at a time and was difficult to clean.
This fryer came with a rotisserie chicken fryer as well. I haven‚Äôt tried cooking rotisserie on it yet though.
It is super easy to clean because the 2 trays come right out and the bottom tray where all liquid gets collected also comes out easily. I am very happy with this purchase.

I have been looking for a new air fryer since my last one broke. I decided to give this a try given it has much larger capacity,1500w, and more features to use. This is definitely a big upgrade from my previous air fryer. The double layer feature is great. Now I can use the upper layer to fry french fries while using the lower layer to make rotisserie chicken. It saves my family a lot of time as you can make two dishes simultaneously. Compare to the older version of air fryer where you have to clean the air fryer basket every time you use it, this one is super easy to clean. You can use cooking pan to fry your food and just clean the pan instead of the entire basket. The see-through window is also a big game changer. It allow you to monitor your food in process instead having to break the airflow in order to check the food. I am super happy with this air fryer and will definitely recommend this to anyone who wants an air fryer.

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality large capacity air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I am super impressed with this air fryer oven. I have tried air frying the fish sticks, sweet potato fries, chicken wings and they all came out amazing. They are super crunchy without adding any additional oil. I love the glass door so I can see how well it cooks the food and flip the tray when the top tray becomes too well done. The oven is much larger than the other type of air fryer. There are also many preset settings so you just have to pick the type of food you are frying and it will set the temperature and time for you. Overall, I am very happy with this air fryer. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText:
I‚Äôve not used it yet but I don‚Äôt see a microwave function, which it was advertised to have.
Since my review Innsky quickly contacted me and apologized for the mistake. They were very helpful and provided me with a satisfactory outcome. As my picture shows, I have now used the fryer and was very happy with the result. Tasty, crispy wings in 18 minutes. And clean-up is so easy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tasty fried foods with less oil
reviews.reviewText: I was contemplating to get an air fryer for long time. At last I took the leap and decided to buy one. I decided to buy a square one instead of the usual oval one because of the more space that I can get with it. This particular one is of 1500W and has more capacity than the conventional styled ones. This has two layers which you can use for different foods at the same time which is a great advantage than the older model ones. Till now I have air fried chicken and various vegetables like potatoes, mushrooms, beans, cauliflowers. This really takes very less oil compared to the conventional frying. The cleaning is also super easy as the lowest layer collects all the dripping oil which you can take out and clean easily. Although it takes a bit of standardization of the amount of frying you want to do for the first time but after that its a breeze. The best thing that I liked is that you just put you program and thats it., you don't have to wait by standing in front of it and that saves a lot of time and less tiring.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great customer support makes up for some cons
reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText:
Initially, i had some problems with cleaning it because after using it to cook my Korean BBQ, i got greases all over, so after my complaints about it, their support reached out and offered me with tips and solutions on how to keep it clean and maintenance, so my problem was might be I just had too much oil/fat on those BBQ to start with. It was great that they actually followed through with me to get my issues resolved and also guaranteed that their warranty will cover any future issues with the oven.

For the oven itself, it's pretty big compare to other air fryer, however, don't expect to have a full grown chicken to fit in there, probably a smaller whole chicken (under 3.5 lbs would fit nicely, anything bigger than that might not fit). It does come with a several accessories to use, one of which is my favorite, which is the mesh basket. My wife used that for the chicken nuggets and meatball BBQ, breaded shrimps and it cooks better using that mesh basket than the tray because it helps drain out all the fats better. I also suggest to put some extra foil wrap on the side of the bottom tray to prevent greases plashing onto the oven's wall.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this large air fryer because I have a large family and needed maximum cooking capacity. Unfortunately having two racks for cooking isn‚Äôt as impressive as one would expect because the food on the lower rack literally takes twice as long to cook. Might as well do two batches. I will probably be returning this and purchasing a different 10 qt air fryer.

This is my first oven air fryer and it's awesome! It's bigger than my regular air fryer, it definitely takes up some counter space. You can use trays to make more meals, it's big enough to make dinner for a family of 4-6. I don't always like the textures of food after microwaved, and this oven air fryer really comes in handy. It's very easy to use. I don't need to preheat it which is one of my favorite things about air fryer, and it only takes few minutes to make nice warm crunchy/crispy meals. It takes some trial and error to figure out the best way to cook, but once you figure out the right combination of time and function everything we have made has turned out great. It's also easy to clean as long as you clean it after use, if you let the dirt/fats sit for few days it would be sticky and harder to clean up. So far so good, I highly recommend!

How, I'm impressed with this air frier/oven!
After hearing so much about air fryers lately, I really wanted to see what was all the hype about it. Unsure if it was really any different than a toaster/convection oven...
Well, I am really impressed! It is different, the food comes out crisper and cooks in a shorter amount of time. I have toasted bread for my bruschetta in less than 3 minutes! I recommend you checking your food often, at the beginning, until you have more experience, because it does cook fast and you don't want to end up with dry, overcooked food.

This air fryer is awesome, you can easily access your food thanks to the three 3 trays that come with it and you can see how it cooks through the little window.
It is definately bigger than expected, so if countertop space is an issue in your kitchen, I recommend checking the measurements.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice design but doesn't serve our purpose
reviews.reviewText:
We bought this for:

2. Large capacity, but the bottom space is not of much use because air flow doesn't get to it. Rotating the trays make foods taste more like baking, not as crispy as in air frying, so we only cook in 1 tray.

It makes food crispy outside and moist inside, more moist than our old air fryer. We are thinking of getting the one- level air fryer with the basket so we could make fresh fries also. Love the design and see-through window

The oven got stainless steel mesh basket, it allows the oil drippings to gather in the non -stick , sturdy pan is easy clean up . Love it !

This Innsky Air Fryer is great. It's large. You can cook a lot of food. It's comes with 2 shelfs but can hold 3. It has the rotisserie basket plus the rotisserie for a small whole chicken and 8 skewers. I unboxed it and was surprised at the good packaging and then the sturdiness of the fryer. It not extremely heavy but sturdy. I got all the accessories out and mounted in the fryer, one at a time to check the difficulty in using them. Absolutely no difficulty, all went in with precision. Next I checked the control panel and I was ready to use. I did wash and dry the accessories before use. I tried a dry run the first time. Once you hit the power button you have about 15 seconds before it turns on. Not a problem once you are familiar with the control panel. You can choose between 150¬∞ to 400¬∞. It default starts at 370¬∞. It cooks really fast compared to the included guidelines. I like the internal light, you can see pretty well. This is my first air fryer so I can't compare it to others on how they work but this was easy to get used to. The food cooks evenly and thourghly. I plan on having this a long time. I'll keep you posted.

There is one things I need to remind you guys, you see the size of the baking oven is smaller than standard one, so the heat is less strong then standard one. So for the recipe on YouTube, I would recommend you to do a little bit higher in temperature and longer in cooking time.
Google the light cheese cake on YouTube, you will like it! That is what I made in past days. Remember to preheat the machine by just turn it on before you bake your cake! I have been wanting an air fryer for a while now but really needed to do my research and make sure we got the right one. I am so glad we waited! This is everything I have hoped for. reviews.reviewTitle: Clunky door, aquward racks, chemical smell
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this product, I had put a ton of research into air fryers prior to purchasing. First I would like to say it came well packaged. I set it up and as I closed the door it was super clunky on the right hand side (like something was broken but I thought if I liked the oven I would either have my husband look at it or talk to a rep as mistakes happen). The first thing I cooked was chicken breasts, it was a bit noisy and the oven put out a funny smell (and yes I had run it prior to cooking in it per the instruction book). I also cooked toast as I had read it could be used as a oven toaster, it pretty much gave you dried out bread, not toasted. I cooked bacon in it one time and it was just OK. One problem is the racks, one is very high in the oven and one low, awkward to get to either on, secondly when you use the rack pulling out tool juices drop everywhere and makes a mess. Thirdly I had wanted a air fryer that was stainless steel on the inside and it is but there is a brown notch on the left hand side of the wall which is not make of stainless steel, the notch is used for the rotisserie function. Lastly after using it several times it still smelled and had the clunky door which I did not think would last. It was easy to clean but did not earn a place of honor on my counter.

reviews.reviewTitle: My first step towards a healthier eating
reviews.reviewText: After heard and tried several delicious dishes cooked by using air-oven by friends and families, we decided to invest one for ourselves. We have been using it quite a lot in the last two weeks after receiving it... and we are very pleased with the purchase. reviews.reviewTitle: Great kitchen tool...with my homemade dribble guard
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this amazing oven because of it's footprint size and basic features. I am very pleased with the product. A dribbling tray on the first use made a mess of the oven door. I also managed to touch a knuckle to the hot door as I was removing that tray. Bread crumbs from croutons fell into the door hinge, and were not easy to brush out. So, I set about coming up with a solution. By trimming a plastic cutting mat, so part slides into the oven (above the drip tray), yet covers the entire open door, dribbles fall onto the mat, I don't accidentally touch the hot surface and a quick wipe takes care of any cooking splatter on the window. Hope this idea helps others as much as it helped me.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText:
Have you noticed all the reviews of this air fryer read like they were all written by the same individual?

I actually bought and have used this item.

Pros:

Cons:
Emits a strong plastic or electrical smell.

One odd thing... It had a sticker on the front glass that said do not remove, however, in the instruction manual it said to remove all stickers. I opted to remove it and boy was that a chore. It took a lot of elbow grease to get the sticker's adhesive off the glass.

reviews.reviewTitle: First really great air fryer for a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: I picked this air fryer after reading reviews and saw that the company responded to every negative review with an offer to make things right. It was a good decision. I have been using another air fryer since last October. I like to make frozen fish fillets in it, but the non-stick surface peeled off after only a few uses, and I‚Äôve been lining it with parchment paper since. This air fryer has real non-stick surface on it‚Äôs trays. I‚Äôve already used it to make fish, and the fillets came out perfectly. I also made fries, and the rotating basket is great. Clean up is super easy. The only suggestion I offer to the company would be to use a label on the glass that has less glue. It has to be removed before use, and it took some effort. That wasn‚Äôt enough to take away even a fraction of a star. The bottom line is that this thing looks great, cooks great, and cleans up great. Here‚Äôs the best part...you can cook enough food in it for supper! Because it has two trays, I was able to cook 4 fillets at the same time. If the fish fillets are large, I can still cook enough for two people instead of one at a time like I did with the last fryer. I should also mention ease of use. I was able to add cook time, increase and lower temperatures, and turn on an inside light to check doneness while the food cooked. I would give it more than 5 stars if I could.

I upgraded air fryers and I have to say I am super impressed with this one. I love that you can see through and check your food. I made a rotisserie chicken, that is a major bonus. The chicken came out perfectly crisp and done with great flavoring ( added seasoning) I have also cooked skirt steak and it came out perfect, very juicy no dryness. I‚Äôm impressed. I love the 2 racks. It has saved me so many night when my kids have had school the next day and we were running late. I call it speed cooker. My kids now complain when I cook on the stove top and not the air fryer. Very convenient & you can cook just about everything in this air fryer. When I am done, I wipe it out and it cleans up really nice. I will also be purchasing another one for my mother in law at Christmas time. I think it would make perfect Christmas gifts. I use this air fry more then my last as it hold so much more food then the standard ones. Now that I have this one, I don‚Äôt know how I ever lived without one.

The recipe book has great ideas however the device should come with a book that informs the customer on ways to cook things other than the recipes. For example a book separated by type of cooking i.e. - rotisserie, frying, how to use the dehydrator to make jerkey (all the features that this device supposedly has). The device comes with two books, recipe and maintenance manual. Also, the light died the first day. I saw it flash when I first plugged it in and once more after that and haven't seen it work since and I've had it for about a month or so now. I've pressed the light button when the device is on as directed and no luck. The icon just blinks....didnt complain because i didn't want to pack up this huge thing to return. I'll just use my kitchen light. We just guestimate what temps we think meats may cook on and the times compared to the recipe book then pray lol the food overall has come out good and pretty crispy. Wish the device were cheaper for what we got, but overall not too upset with the purchase.

Wow! I've been wanting a air fryer for a long time, and finally broke down and made the purchase. Kicking myself in the butt for not ordering much sooner. This air fryer has been such big part of my life since the purchase. When running late on the go, or just simply not feeling well, I throw some chicken tenders and fries in and it's done in minutes. ( cooks much more than chicken tenders and fries, was just a example)

I've also made pizza and even a rotisserie chicken in this. No grease is a huge plus. More healthy ( atleast makes me feel like I'm eating more healthy haha) and less mess. It has been very easy to use and clean. Can even put the removable parts in dishwasher :)

It comes with so much accessories,which is a huge plus as well. I don't think I could have chosen a better Air fryer. This is definitely the all in one, go to fryer. Well worth the money spent!

¬†This is not a traditional oven; it has multiple functions that help to maintain a healthy diet. I have been using this primarily to dehydrate fruits and chicken breasts for healthy snacks for the kids.
The fryer has an adequate capacity large enough to cook a whole chicken. It will provide enough food for a family dinner. Cooking is made so easy with the LCD manual panel. Press dehydrate for instance and then set timer and temperature. And there is the handy light to check your cooking status. There are so many accessories coming in the package that provides the oven with diverse cooking styles. You do not need to take a cooking course to make a delicious meal on your own. And most importantly, you can enjoy turkey jerky and lamb kebobs without the guilty feeling with the cholesterol.

I was looking for an air frier to replace my old broken one and came across this all in one air frier oven. I have to say that I‚Äôm very impressed how easy it is to operate and clean. I have been using it four times so far. I made potato chips and chicken wings. They came out pretty good. This oven is well designed, it has big capacity even though it looks smaller than my regular countertop oven. It cooks easily for the whole family. I replaced my countertop oven and air frier with this all in one piece. I am happy with this purchase.

The holiday season is officially upon us. I got this air fryer oven to help with my holiday cooking. I always have to do multiple batches in the oven due to lack of oven space. This air fryer oven is the perfect addition to my cooking gadget arsenal.

I gave this air fryer oven a test spin and here is what I liked about it. The oven has a small footprint, it doesn't take up much counter space. Which is great beacuse I don't have a ton of space.

The oven has a digital display that is easy to read and use. There are several cooking presets. If your cooking chicken just press the chicken button. You can adjust the time and temperature with the push of a button.

While your cooking the time that is left and temperature flashes on the display. The sides of the case does get hot but not too hot that you have to worry about getting burnt. There is a light button on the oven that you can press to see what's going on inside the oven. When you open the oven door to check on the food the timer does pause and will automatically resume once you close the oven door. When the food is done cooking there is a loud beep that can be heard from another room. Also when it's cooking there is an audible hum coming from the machine.

The oven has a large cooking capacity. I was able to cook 24 wing dings in one batch. They came out perfectly. I also made bacon and didn't have to flip it.

The oven is easy to clean. The drip tray is perfect for catching any crumbs or drippings. The trays are nonstick and easy to clean. I also noticed that the trays cool pretty fast once you remove them from the oven. The inside as well as the outside of the oven can be easily wiped clean.

This oven is a great addition to any kitchen. My holiday cooking time will be greatly cut in half.

reviews.reviewText: This air fryer oven has many uses and I‚Äôve cooked many different types of food with it. The first food I tried to cook with it was one of the best I‚Äôve ever had before. reviews.reviewTitle: Very very pleased with this purchase!
reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText:
I just purchased this air fryer last night. I want the first part of my review to detail why I chose this model and manufacturer. First, I am giving this 3 stars as of now until I get to try the model. I will change the rating based on usage.

I chose this particular model and brand out of the plethora of options primarily because of the negative reviews. Yes, the negative reviews. There was a common theme: the manufacturer took the time to address the reviews and tried to make everything right with the customer. That in of itself impressed me incredibly and gives me the confidence to make this almost $200 purchase that if anything is awry or wrong, that the company will do it's absolute best to fix the issue(s).

I've owned this product for a week now. I have cooked wings, pork chops, fish, a rotisserie chicken, and chicken nuggets for my kids. Everything has come out crispy and delicious. I started Keto and bought this to help me cook faster and in a variety of ways to help with my keto journey. There is plenty of cooking space. There are 2 racks, and as long as you remember to set a timer to flip the food (you do this in an oven also), then the food will come out crispy on all sides. The rotisserie chicken came out just as good as a store-bought one. There are a plethora of recipes online to look through. The pre-defined settings are spot on.

My only complaint with the design of this unit is the door, and hopefully, the manufacturer will revisit my review and address this. The left or right henge can come out of sync a little when opening and closing the door. If you're not careful, I can see the door breaking off with enough applied pressure. If you're cognizant of this as you're opening and closing the door, it won't be a problem.

Overall, you will not be disappointed with this air fryer. I have used this almost every day since it arrived. Again, the #1 reason to make the purchase is that the manufacturer a) makes so far a quality product and b) will address any and all issues that you have through your comments and reviews here. That shows that they care about and stand by their products.

The fragrance of the chicken smell so good! It makes me so hungry! It takes less than thirty minutes to cook the roast chicken! Also, this air oven can use in different ways! I‚Äôm sure you won‚Äôt be disappointed after using it! Relatively, you will be fall in love with is air oven! It‚Äôs easy to use, to clean and to storage. On top of it, you can eat healthy food too!
